data.description:
( NO SETUP NEEDED TO PLAY )

**3D Coverage Everywhere**

- Almost every recognizable city on earth is available in True 3D, even my tiny town in a poor side of Romania is covered, so you are likely able to visit your own street in 3D

**ChatGPT Integration: The AI companion can**

- Naturally respond in YOUR OWN Language

- Visualize & understand your surroundings for any educational purpose or to simply give fun facts

- Teleport you anywhere on earth if asked

- .. and more

**Street View**

- Best UNCOMPRESSED 8k Quality on the market, with every street 360 and community panorama on earth

**Realistic Graphics**

- Real Life Inspired Lighting based on the Customizable Day/Night Cycle
- Realistic, Reactive Fog Option

**Multiplayer**

- Explore alongside a friend

**Hand Tracking**

- Fly like a Superhero by pointing your index finger

- Rotate by Turning an Imaginary Steering Wheel

**Terrain Quality**

- The 3D Map Quality can go much further than anything else out there and achieve realistic 3D by pushing the map quality to extreme detail with the best possible performance

**Comfort Settings**

- Comfort Options ( Snap Turning / Flight Vignette ) to prevent Motion Sickness

- Input Remapping ( Flight Controls Range from Simple to Complex Cinematic Flying )

**Google Maps Integration**

- Smart / manual zoom based on altitude

- Paired with the compass for body orientation

- Full Google Maps functionality on the Map Window feature

**.. out of space, check "earthquest.site" ..**

changelog.change_log:
-
v35.20-v35.22 released

- More natural colors in Immersive Mode
- Fixed Cloud Inconsistency
- Further optimized Immersive Mode for Performance
--
v35.03-v35.05 released

- Improved Flight Collision and Computation, no more accidentally getting stuck or going out of bounds

- Fixed a rare but game-breaking globe scaling bug in space and high altitudes

- Fixed fog not starting when entering EQ at around sea level altitude ( 0 m height )

- More natural Moon visuals at horizon level
and Moon scaling

- Updated Android Permissions to stay in compliance with Meta's terms

v35 should now be stable
--
v35.00 is finally RELEASED !!

We‚Äôve had many ‚Äúbiggest updates‚Äù in EarthQuest‚Äôs journey, because to be fair, they were at their time.

I‚Äôm happy to announce this update is now BY FAR the biggest, most polished, advanced & comprehensive update so far - in terms of effort that went into it, and how big of an overall EarthQuest overhaul it is.

It is meant to expand on every single aspect of the exploration experience as much as possible, to offer the best possible experience and immersion.

Flight Mechanics have been reengineered from the ground up for realism, seamlessness and immersion

- The flow of motion is now significantly more fluid
- Every flight movement & input combination will now be 100% natural, realistic, and satisfying.
- Smooth Rotation for all Flight Input Modes
- Everything applies to both Hand and Controller Tracking !

Going all-in on Immersion for Immersive Sky Mode  
( now called ‚ÄòImmersive Mode‚Äô )

- The most realistic graphics VR Exploration experiences have ever been blessed with !  
- Real Life-inspired Fog has been added to the ‚ÄòImmersive Mode‚Äô
- Better Clouds

Unlimited Location Save Slots, with Full Address Preview Support

- You heard that right ! UNLIMITED

AI Upgrades

- Faster, more intelligent AI

- Refined AI Interface

Mini-map Enlarge button

- A simple toggle will make the mini-map the size of the entire menu, with appropriately sized zooming options !

Additional

- Performance Optimizations
- UI design improvements
- New soundtrack

+ 100s more, check the community ( contact.earthquest.site )  
for the full list.

-
v35.20-v35.22 released

- More natural colors in Immersive Mode
- Fixed Cloud Inconsistency
- Further optimized Immersive Mode for Performance

- More natural Moon visuals at horizon level
and Moon scaling

- Updated Android Permissions to stay in compliance with Meta's terms

v35 should now be stable

v35.00 is finally **RELEASED** !!

We‚Äôve had many ‚Äúbiggest updates‚Äù in EarthQuest‚Äôs journey, because, to be fair, they were at their time.

I‚Äôm happy to announce this update is now **BY FAR** the biggest, most polished, advanced & comprehensive update so far - in terms of effort that went into it, and how big of an overall EarthQuest overhaul it is.

It is meant to expand on every single aspect of the exploration experience as much as possible, to offer the best possible experience and immersion.

**Flight Mechanics have been reengineered from the ground up for realism, seamlessness and immersion**

- The flow of motion is now significantly more fluid
- Every flight movement & input combination will now be 100% natural, realistic, and satisfying.
- Smooth Rotation for all Flight Input Modes
- **Everything applies to both Hand and Controller Tracking !**

**Going all-in on Immersion for Immersive Sky Mode**
*( now called ‚Äò**Immersive Mode**' )*

- The most realistic **graphics** VR Exploration experiences have ever been blessed with !  
- Real Life-inspired **Fog** has been added to the ‚Äò**Immersive Mode**‚Äô
- **Better Clouds**

**Unlimited Location Save Slots**, with Full Address Preview Support

- You heard that right ! UNLIMITED

**AI Upgrades**

- Faster, more intelligent ***AI***

- Refined ***AI*** Interface

**Mini-map** ***Enlarge*** button

- A simple toggle will make the mini-map the size of the entire menu, with appropriately sized zooming options !

**Additional**

- Performance Optimizations
- UI design improvements
- New soundtrack

**+**  100s more, check the community ( contact.earthquest.site )
for the full list.

---
v34.20 is LIVE !!

- Street View now supports different levels of quality !
( 4k, 8k ) 
This allows users with slower internet speeds enjoy fast & responsive Street View !

- Slightly improved Menu Mini-Map readability

---
v34.02 is RELEASED !!

The powerful new 'Random Destination' feature is now even more powerful !

The function should now always send the user to a 3D Destination ü•≥

And not to worry, the size of available locations is still massive compared to the previous list, with destinations well over a DOZEN !

üéÅ
---
v34.03 is out

Bugfix Update

- Fixed 'Random Destination' coordinates not working in other system languages

- Fixed Teleportation not applying "close-to-the-ground" altitude when using some system languages other than English

- Fixed pasting coordinates on the 'Search for Place' not working in other system languages
---

v34.02 is RELEASED !!

The powerful new 'Random Destination' feature is now even more powerful !

The function should now always send the user to a 3D Destination ü•≥

And not to worry, the size of available locations is still massive compared to the previous list, with destinations well over a DOZEN !

üéÅ
-
v34.03 is out

- Fixed 'Random Destination' coordinates not working in other system languages

- Fixed Teleportation not applying "close-to-the-ground" altitude when using some system languages other than English

- Fixed pasting coordinates on the 'Search for Place' not working in other system languages

v34.02 is RELEASED !!

The powerful new 'Random Destination' feature is now even more powerful !

The function should now always send the user to a 3D Destination ü•≥

And not to worry, the size of available locations is still massive compared to the previous list, with destinations well over a DOZEN !

üéÅ

v33.30 is OUT !!

Was previously slightly wrong about the "bug-free" statement since I just found a bug related to the wind, which I just fixed !

More true-to-life wind volume level
( less noticeably repetitive/unpleasant for a small percentage of users )

Fixed flight-wind bug, where the sound would continue playing if continuously attempting to fly into a surface ( and obviously not moving ).
